      void Engine.startAttack(Controllable atkr, java.awt.Point tarLoc)
      initializes combat between attacker Controllable and Unit at target location, if selected target exists and is valid
      void Engine.startBuild(Controllable builder, java.awt.Point buildingRefCoords, java.lang.Enum buildingType)
      sends given Builder to build given building, at given location, if given location is valid
      void Engine.startMove(Controllable cont, java.awt.Point tarLoc)
      initilaizes given Controllable's movement to given location, if given location is valid
      void Engine.stopAttack(Controllable atkr)
      stops given Controllable's attacks
      void Engine.stopBuild(Controllable builder)
      stops given Builder's building process
      void Engine.stopMove(Controllable cont)
      stops given Controllable's movement, as if it has reached its destination (therefore the 'same' movement cannot be resumed)
